pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Zero-One (2019, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Thouser's $(l:zero_one/devices/zaia_thousandriver)ZAIA Thousandriver (Thouser)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Zero-One's $(l:zero_one/riders/zero_one#amazing_caucasus)Amazing Caucasus$(/l) form
